title: Launch - Ensure the postseason message appears and can be closed
custom_preconds: Launch a build that has postseason enabled.
custom_steps: 1. Install the build with postseason enabled
custom_expected:
Expected:
The postseason message appears and the user can close the message (circle button)

title: WCS - NL teams appear correctly in the NL Wild Card Tile
custom_steps:
1. Launch the MLB.TV app with Postseason view enabled
2. Navigate to the Wild Card Series
3. Observe the NL Game tile
custom_expected:
Both teams are correct and appear without any issue

w/ Scores on: 
- If game is in-progress, scores are present, inning is displayed and game status is present
- If game is over, final score is present and the pitching stats appear.
w/ Score off: 
- If the game is over, only 'Final' should appears in the game tile along with the two team logos
- If game is in-progress, only 'in-progress' appears in the game tile along with the two team logos.

title: WCS - Navigation - Pressing R1 takes the user to the Divisional Series
custom_steps:
1. Launch the MLB.TV app with Postseason view enabled
2. Navigate to the Wild Card Series
3. Press the R1 button
custom_expected: After pressing the R1 button, the user should be taken to the 'Division Series' matchup within the postseason view.

3. Press the triangle button and select 'Home Team'
custom_expected: The user should be taken to the 'Home Team' view.

title: DS - Landing Page - ALDS Series 1 - Teams appear correctly in the game tile
custom_preconds:
Have postseason view enabled
Test with 'scores' on
Test with 'scores' off
Test with VOD
Test with Live game
custom_steps:
1. Launch the MLB.TV app with Postseason view enabled
2. Navigate to the 'Division' Series
3. Observe the AL Game tile 1
custom_expected:
Both teams are correct and appear without any issue

w/ Scores on: 
- If game is in-progress, scores are present, inning is displayed and game status is present
- If game is over, final score is present and the pitching stats appear.
w/ Score off: 
- If the game is over, only 'Final' should appears in the game tile along with the two team logos
- If game is in-progress, only 'in-progress' appears in the game tile along with the two team logos.
